pageContent: Aim: The involvement of various penile structures in radiotherapy (RT)-induced sexual dysfunction among prostate cancer survivors remains unclear and domains beyond erectile dysfunction such as orgasm, and pain have typically not been considered. The purpose of this study was to investigate sexual dysfunction post-RT for localized prostate cancer and to examine whether radiation dose to different penile structures can explain these symptoms.

metaData.source:
Focal therapy for prostate cancer - where are we in 2011?
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/21969848/
